thread.title: Gap Reports Downbeat Profit Guidance, Drop in September Sales
thread.title_full: Gap Reports Downbeat Profit Guidance, Drop in September Sales - WSJ

author: George Stahl
title: Gap Reports Downbeat Profit Guidance, Drop in September Sales
text:
Gap Inc. said total sales in September fell 1%, hurt by the stronger dollar and weakness at Banana Republic, and gave downbeat guidance on the companyâ€™s expected profitability in the current quarter.
The retailer said it now expects its gross margin rate for the third quarter to be similar to the second quarter. In the July quarter, Gap had a...
